chapter.text: niccayamaka nam inta kur'anai (mikka kanniyamulla) lailatul katr ennum or iravil (mutalavataka) irakkivaittom
(napiye!) Antak kanniyamulla iravin makimaiyai nir arivira
kanniyamulla anta iravu ayiram matankalai vita mikka melanatakum
atil vanavarkalum, jiprayilum, tankal iraivanin kattalaiyin pati (nataipera ventiya) ella kariyankalutan irankukinranar
